context.p: Use this procedure to edit an package.

step.note: Skip this step if your is already stored in a folder.
step.cmd: Unzip the ZIP archive associated with the in a separate folder.
Link the folder associated with the in the Project view.
Using the Project view, you can modify the resources (CSS, JS, fonts) within the folder to fit your needs.
Open the publishing template descriptor (with .opt extension) in editor to edit. You will benefit by content completion and validation support.

step.note: You can skip this step. A can be stored also in a folder.
step.cmd: Once to finish your customization you can archive the folder as ZIP.
